speakerBioSummary.text:
• Saweetie is a rapper, songwriter, actress, and designer.
  • The music video for her debut single titled "ICY GRL” has been watched over 78 million times and earned her praise from Vibe Magazine, XXL, HipHopDX, and MTV UK as an artist to watch in 2018.
  • She was named on Red Bull Music’s 2019 ‘Artists to Watch’ list and Paper Magazine’s ‘Women in Hip-Hop: The Voices of Our Generation.”
  • As an entrepreneur, Saweetie launched The ICY Chain based off of her hit song named “Icy”, exclusively through Instagram. The necklace sold out in 6 hours from one post. Saweetie has also partnered with Tinder, Red Bull, Ciroc, Beats by Dre and more.

speakerBiography.text:
Saweetie is a rapper, songwriter, actress, and designer. The music video for her debut single titled "ICY GRL” has been watched over 78 million times and earned her praise from Vibe Magazine, XXL, HipHopDX, and MTV UK as an artist to watch in 2018. Saweetie’s daily Apple Music streams saw an 129% increase, and her Spotify streams are up 82%. Her 2019 single ‘My Type’ went Platinum. She was named on Red Bull Music’s 2019 ‘Artists to Watch’ list and Paper Magazine’s ‘Women in Hip-Hop: The Voices of Our Generation.” Saweetie was most recently featured in Elle Magazine’s ‘Up Next’.

As an entrepreneur, Saweetie launched The ICY Chain based off of her hit song named “Icy” in February, exclusively through Instagram. The necklace sold out in 6 hours from one post. Saweetie most recently partnered with Tinder, Red Bull, Ciroc, Beats by Dre and more.

She is signed to Warner Bros. Records and is a USC graduate. Saweetie’s sophomore EP was released March 29, 2019.
